title: Road not repaired for 6 months
description: The main road in Jayanagar 4th Block has been damaged since monsoon. Multiple potholes causing accidents. Vehicles are getting damaged. Urgent repair needed.

title: Streetlight not working
description: The streetlight near bus stop on 5th cross road is not working for 2 weeks. The area becomes very dark at night. Safety concern for pedestrians.

title: Garbage not collected
description: Garbage truck has not come to our area for 5 days. Waste is piling up and causing bad smell. Flies and mosquitoes increasing. Health hazard.

title: Water supply timing query
description: What is the water supply schedule for BTM Layout? I moved here recently and want to know the timings.

title: Property tax receipt not received
description: I paid my property tax online 3 weeks ago but haven't received the receipt. Transaction ID: TXN789456. Need receipt for documentation.

title: Delay in building permit
description: Applied for building permit 2 months ago (Application ID: BPA-2024-5678). No updates received. Multiple visits to office but no resolution. This is causing project delays.

title: Emergency: Water pipeline burst
description: URGENT! Water pipeline has burst near MG Road junction. Water flooding the road. Traffic blocked. Immediate action needed!

title: Request for birth certificate
description: I need to apply for a birth certificate for my newborn. What documents are required and what is the process?

title: Sewage overflow in residential area
description: Sewage is overflowing on 12th main road, Indiranagar. Dirty water entering homes. Health emergency. Children falling sick.

title: Park maintenance needed
description: The children's park in our locality needs maintenance. Swings are broken, grass is overgrown. Kids can't play safely.

title: Corruption complaint against official
description: An official at the sub-registrar office demanded Rs. 5000 bribe for property registration. I have audio recording as evidence. Please take action.

title: Status of license application
description: I applied for a trade license for my shop on 15th January. Application number: TL-2024-789. What is the current status?
